description:
The Bumbler Trio is working hard to repay their debts by picking up trash. As they`re walking, they find a hole in the dirt that leads underground, and poking out from the hole is...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kirakira! Dekoru no Daisuki Non-chan Desu non! Dechi!
Sparkle! I`m Non-chan, and I Love to Decorate, Non!
キラキラ! デコるの大好きのんちゃんですのん! でち!
